name: Hubot for HipChat
description: A helpful bot for your HipChat group

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_JID.description: Your bot's Jabber ID which can be found in the XMPP/Jabber settings for your bot's HipChat user account; e.g. 123_456@chat.hipchat.com.

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_PASSWORD.description: The password for your bot's HipChat user account.

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_ROOMS.description: A comma-separated list of room JIDs that you want your bot to join.

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_ROOMS_BLACKLIST.description: A comma-separated list of room JIDs that you DON'T want your bot to join.

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_JOIN_ROOMS_ON_INVITE.description: Setting this to `false` will prevent the HipChat adapter from auto-joining rooms when invited.

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_HOST.description: Use this to connect to a HipChat host other than `hipchat.com`.

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_XMPP_DOMAIN.description: Set to `btf.hipchat.com` if using a self-hosted HipChat Server.

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_RECONNECT.description: Set to `false` to prevent the HipChat adapter from auto-reconnecting if it detects a server error or disconnection.

HUBOT_HIPCHAT_JOIN_PUBLIC_ROOMS.description: Set to `false` to prevent the bot from joining guest-accessible rooms.

HUBOT_LOG_LEVEL.description: Set to `debug` to enable detailed debug logging.

HUBOT_HEROKU_KEEPALIVE_URL.description: Set to use the subdomain of this bot to keep it awake

BUILDPACK_URL.description: Only change this if you are sure you need to.
